data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Radea, Canella, Parmakelis, Aristeidis, Giokas, Sinos (2016): Myrtoessahyas, a new valvatiform genus and a new species of the Hydrobiidae (Caenogastropoda, Truncatelloidea) from Greece. ZooKeys 640: 1-18, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.640.10674, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.640.10674
